items.sentence: Do you have to stay in Boston as long as Tom does?
I had no idea there was a bank so near your house.
Tom tried to impress Mary with his cooking skills.
What\'s the price per night including all charges?
Aren\'t you even going to ask me what I was doing?
Aren\'t you going to tell Tom about what happened?
That\'s one of the most common complaints we hear.
You\'re likely the only person who has to do that.
How many times have your suggestions been ignored?
Tom was smart enough to figure out what was wrong.
